attributes.action: allow all year 10s to be able to use the formulae sheet in next years GCSEs
attributes.additional_details: because i believe that year 10s have been effected by covid 19 as well as year 11s as we missed a lot of education and has taken more time to catch up .
attributes.background: allow all schools in britain year 10s students to have the formulae sheet

rejection.details: The decision to allow or to not allow GCSE maths formula sheets is a decision for Ofqual and not for the Government or Parliament.
